business_summary: Diversified industrial power management company. Electrical components, aerospace, vehicles, eMobility. Key beneficiary of electrification mega-trend (EVs, data centers, grid infrastructure). Global footprint with strong Americas presence.
bull_case: Electrification mega-trend accelerates - EVs need power management, data centers expanding for AI, grid infrastructure spending for renewables. Eaton is picks-and-shovels play on all three. Consistent execution and margin expansion.
bear_case: Industrial cycle turns down, construction spending slows, EV adoption slower than expected reducing eMobility segment growth. Multiple compression if growth slows (currently trading at premium 32x P/E).
key_risks: Premium valuation (32x P/E) leaves room for multiple compression
upcoming_catalysts: Data center power demand growth (AI buildout)
analyst_notes: ETN is a cleaner setup than AVGO today. Lower debt (D/E 60 vs 166), stronger signal (58.7 vs 53.3), more extreme oversold (Z-score -2.49). The electrification theme is secular not cyclical. Institutional ownership at 86% shows smart money conviction. The pullback appears to be general industrial sector rotation, not company-specific. This is a quality compounder temporarily on sale.

proteus_signal_assessment.recommendation: TRADE WITH CONVICTION - Stronger signal, cleaner balance sheet, secular tailwinds. Prefer over AVGO.
